1.verse: Onyankopɔn akasa - Mmere a atwam no, na Onyankopɔn nam akwan horow bebree so fa adiyifo so kasa kyerɛ yɛn mpanyimfo.

2.verse: Mmom mmere a edi akyiri yi de, ɔnam ne Ba no so akasa akyerɛ yɛn. Ɔyɛ obi a Onyankopɔn nam ne so bɔɔ wiase. Na ɔno na Onyankopɔn ayi no sɛ awiei no, nneɛma nyinaa bɛyɛ ne de.

3.verse: Ɔnam Onyankopɔn anuonyam hyerɛn a ɔhyerɛn no so hran. Ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn sɛso pɛpɛɛpɛ, na ɔde n’asɛm a tumi wɔ mu no so wiase mu. Ɔtew nnipa ho fi wɔn bɔne mu wiei no, ɔtenaa Otumfo Nyankopɔn nifa so wɔ soro.

4.verse: Ɛno nti, ɔyɛɛ kɛse sen abɔfo no, efisɛ edin a Onyankopɔn de too no no yɛ kɛse sen wɔn de no.

5.verse: Efisɛ, Onyankopɔn nso anka ankyerɛ n’abɔfo no mu biara se, “Woyɛ me Ba na nnɛ, mabɛyɛ w’agya.” Ɛnna wanka ankyerɛ ɔbɔfo biara se, “Mɛyɛ w’agya na wayɛ me Ba.”

6.verse: Bere a Onyankopɔn pɛe sɛ ɔsoma n’abakan no ba wiase no, ɔsan kae se, “Ɛsɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn abɔfo nyinaa som no.”

7.verse: Asɛm a Onyankopɔn ka faa abɔfo no ho ne sɛ, “Onyankopɔn yɛ n’abɔfo mframa ne n’asomfo gyadɛwee.”

8.verse: Na ɛfa Ɔba no ho no, Onyankopɔn kae sɛ, “O, Onyankopɔn, w’ahengua bɛtena hɔ daa nyinaa; w’ahenni yɛ atɛntrenee.

9.verse: Wodɔ trenee, na wukyi bɔne; ɛno nti na Onyankopɔn a ɔyɛ wo Nyankopɔn no yii wo hyɛɛ wo anuonyam a ɛso sen w’ahokafo no.”

10.verse: Onyankopɔn san kae se, “Wo, Awurade, na mfitiase no wobɔɔ asase na wode w’ankasa wo nsa bɔɔ soro.

11.verse: Ne nyinaa betwam na wo de wobɛtena hɔ; ne nyinaa behi sɛ ntamagow.

12.verse: Wɔbɛbobɔw no sɛ atade, na wɔbɛsesa no sɛ ntade. Nanso wo de, daa wote sɛ nea wote; na wo mfe renhi da.”

13.verse: Onyankopɔn anka ankyerɛ n’abɔfo no se, “Montena me nifa so kosi sɛ mede mo atamfo bɛyɛ mo nan ase ntiaso.”

14.verse: Sɛ saa a, na abɔfo no yɛ dɛn? Wɔn nyinaa yɛ ahonhom a wɔsom Onyankopɔn na ɔsoma wɔn ma wɔkɔboa wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ nkwagye no.

1.verse: Kristo kaa owu hwɛe maa yɛn nyinaa - Eyi nti na ɛsɛ sɛ yeso nokware a yɛate no mu dennen sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a biribi rentu yɛn aso.

2.verse: Nsɛm a abɔfo no kae no yɛ nokware enti obiara a wanni so no nyaa asotwe a ɛfata no.

3.verse: Na sɛ yɛantie saa nkwagyesɛm yi a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛatumi aguan? Awurade no ankasa na odii kan kaa saa nkwagye yi ho asɛm na wɔn a wotiee no no, ama yɛahu sɛ ɛyɛ nokware.

4.verse: Saa bere koro no ara mu Onyankopɔn nam ne tumi adeyɛ ne n’anwonwadwuma so dii ho adanse. Bio, ɔkyɛɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɛnea ɔpɛ.

5.verse: Onyankopɔn amma abɔfo anni wiase a na wayɛ n’adwene sɛ ɔrebɛbɔ no so; saa wiase a yɛka ho asɛm no.

6.verse: Na mmom, wɔaka no Kyerɛwsɛm no mu baabi se; “Onyankopɔn, onipa yɛ dɛn a ɛsɛ sɛ wudwen ne ho; onipa teta a ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ no?

7.verse: Wobɔɔ no ma ɔyɛɛ akumaa kakra sen abɔfo; wohyɛɛ no anuonyam,

8.verse: sɛ onni nneɛma nyinaa so.” Ɛka se Onyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa “Nneɛma nyinaa sodifo;” eyi da no adi sɛ biribiara ka ho. Nanso yenhu sɛ mprempren onipa di nneɛma nyinaa so.

9.verse: Nanso yehu Yesu! Mmere tiaa bi wɔbɔɔ no hyɛɛ abɔfo ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛnam Onyankopɔn ahummɔbɔ nti, ɛsɛ sɛ owu ma nnipa nyinaa no. Yehu no sɛ esiane owu a owui no nti, wɔahyɛ no anuonyam.

10.verse: Eye sɛ Onyankopɔn a ɔbɔ nneɛma nyinaa na ɔhwɛ so no bɛma Yesu nam n’amanehunu no mu ayɛ pɛ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔbɛma ne mma nyinaa akɔ saa anuonyam no mu bi. Efisɛ, Yesu no nko ara ne Onipa a obedi wɔn anim akɔ nkwagye no mu.

11.verse: Ɔma nnipa yɛ kronn fi wɔn bɔne mu. Na ɔne wɔn a wayɛ wɔn kronn no nyinaa wɔ Agya baako. Ɛno nti na Yesu mfɛre sɛ ɔfrɛ wɔn anuanom no.

12.verse: Ɔka se, “Onyankopɔn, mɛka wo ho asɛm makyerɛ me nuanom; mɛkamfo wo wɔ wɔn a wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa anim.”

13.verse: Ɔsan ka bio se, “Mede me ho bɛto Onyankopɔn so.” Na ɔno nso ka se, “Mma a Onyankopɔn de wɔn ama me, na me ne wɔn ahyia yi.”

14.verse: Esiane sɛ mma no wɔ honam ne mogya nti, Yesu nso bae onipa tebea mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔnam ne wu no so bɛsɛe ɔbonsam a okita owu tumi no ahoɔden.

15.verse: Na ɔnam so agye wɔn a esiane sɛ wosuro owu nti, wɔn asetena mu nyinaa, wɔayɛ nkoa no.

16.verse: Ɛyɛ nokware turodoo sɛ ɛnyɛ abɔfo na ɔboa wɔn. Na mmom, sɛnea Kyerɛwsɛm no ka no, “Ɔboa Abraham asefo.”

17.verse: Eyi kyerɛ sɛ, ɔkwan biara so no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ sɛ ne nuanom sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔbɛyɛ wɔn nokwafo ne mmɔborɔhunufo ɔsɔfo Panyin wɔ ne Nyamesom mu na ɛnam so ma wɔde nnipa bɔne akyɛ wɔn.

18.verse: Enti afei obetumi aboa wɔn a wɔasɔ wɔn ho ahwɛ efisɛ, ɔno ankasa wɔsɔɔ no hwɛe ma ohuu amane.

1.verse: Kristofo yɛ Onyankopɔn fi - Me nuanom wɔ Kristo mu a Onyankopɔn afrɛ mo, munnwen Yesu a Onyankopɔn somaa no ma ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔsɔfo Panyin wɔ gyidi a yɛka ho asɛm no ho.

2.verse: Na odi Onyankopɔn a oyii no sɛ ɔnyɛ saa adwuma yi no nokware sɛnea Mose nso dii nokware wɔ Onyankopɔn fi no.

3.verse: Onipa a osi ofi nya anuonyam sen ofi no ankasa.

4.verse: Saa ara na ɛte; ɛsɛ sɛ Yesu nya anuonyam sen Mose. Ofi biara, obi na osii. Na Onyankopɔn nso na wabɔ nneɛma nyinaa.

5.verse: Mose di Onyankopɔn nokware sɛ ɔsomfo wɔ ne fi na ɔkaa nsɛm a Onyankopɔn bɛka daakye no nyinaa.

6.verse: Nanso Kristo de, odi nokware sɛ Ɔba a ɔhwɛ Onyankopɔn fi so. Sɛ yɛma yɛn bo yɛ duru na yɛwɔ gyidi wɔ yɛn mu wɔ anidaso mu a, na yɛyɛ ne fi.

7.verse: Enti Honhom Kronkron no ka se, “Sɛ nnɛ mote Onyankopɔn nne a,

8.verse: monnyɛ asoɔden te sɛ nea moyɛe bere a mosɔre tiaa Onyankopɔn no; sɛnea moyɛe da a na mowɔ sare so a mosɔɔ no hwɛe no.

9.verse: Ɛmaa mo mpanyimfo sɔɔ no hwɛe, sɛnea Onyankopɔn ka ni, ɛwom, wohuu nea meyɛɛ no mfe aduanan.

10.verse: Esiane saa nti, me bo fuw saa nnipa no kae se, ‘Wɔfom daa wɔ wɔn koma mu, na wontie me mmara nsɛm.’

11.verse: “Me bo fuwii na mekaa ntam se, ‘Wɔremma me home mu da.’ “

12.verse: Me nnuanom, monhwɛ yiye na mo mu bi annya koma bɔne a ɔrennye Onyankopɔn nni na ɛbɛma watwe ne ho afi Onyankopɔn teasefo no ho.

13.verse: Na mmom, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a bɔne rennaadaa mo mu bi na wɔnyɛ asoɔden nti, da biara mommoaboa mo ho mo ho bere a asɛm “Ɛnnɛ” a ɛwɔ Kyerɛwsɛm mu no fa yɛn ho no.

14.verse: Na sɛ yeso gyidi a yɛwɔ no mu dennen sɛnea yɛde fi mfitiase no a, na yɛyɛ Kristo fafafo.

15.verse: Kyerɛwsɛm no ka se, “Sɛ ɛnnɛ mote Onyankopɔn nne a, monnyɛ asoɔden te sɛ nea moayɛ bere a mosɔre tiaa Onyankopɔn no.”

16.verse: Ɛhefo na wɔtee Onyankopɔn nne na wɔsɔre tiaa no no? Nnipa a Mose dii wɔn anim fi Misraim no nyinaa.

17.verse: Ɛhefo na Onyankopɔn bo fuw wɔn mferehyia aduanan no? Nnipa a wɔyɛɛ bɔne na wɔtetew hwe wuwui wɔ sare so no.

18.verse: Bere a Onyankopɔn kaa ntam, “Wɔremma me home mu da no,” na ɔreka akyerɛ ɛhefo? Na ɔreka akyerɛ wɔn a wɔayɛ no dɔm no.

19.verse: Afei yehu sɛ wɔantumi ankɔ mu, efisɛ, wɔannye anni.

1.verse: Homebea Foforo - Afei, esiane sɛ bɔhyɛ a ɛfa ne mu home da so wɔ hɔ nti, momma yɛnhwɛ yiye na mo mu bi antɔ sin wɔ mu.

2.verse: Efisɛ, wɔaka Asɛmpa no akyerɛ yɛn sɛnea wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn no. Nanso wɔammu asɛm a wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, efisɛ, wɔn a wotiee no annye anni.

3.verse: Na yɛn a yɛagye adi no kɔ saa home no mu sɛnea Onyankopɔn aka se, “Enti mifi m’abufuw mu ka ntam se, ‘Wɔrenkɔ me home mu da.’“ Ɔkaa saa asɛm yi de, nanso bere a ɔbɔɔ wiase no, na owiee n’adwuma.

4.verse: Na Kyerɛwsɛm no mu baabi wɔka biribi fa da a ɛto so ason no ho se, “Da a ɛto so ason no, Onyankopɔn homee a wanyɛ adwuma biara.”

5.verse: Wɔkaa saa asɛm koro yi ara bio se, “Wɔremma me home mu da.”

6.verse: Wɔn a wodii kan tee Asɛmpa no anhome wɔ Onyankopɔn mu, efisɛ, wɔannye anni. Afoforo bi nso wɔ hɔ a wɔma wɔn kwan na wɔhome wɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn.

7.verse: Wogyina nokwasɛm a Onyankopɔn aka se wayi da bi ato hɔ a wɔfrɛ no “Ɛnnɛ,” no so. Mfe pii akyi no, ɔnam Dawid so kae wɔ Kyerɛwsɛm no mu se, “Ɛnnɛ, sɛ mote Onyankopɔn nne a, mummpirim mo koma.”

8.verse: Sɛ Yosua dii nnipa no anim de wɔn kɔɔ Onyankopɔn home mu a, anka akyiri yi Onyankopɔn anka da foforo ho asɛm.

9.verse: Sɛnea ɛte yi, ɔhome da so wɔ hɔ ma Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo sɛnea Onyankopɔn homee da a ɛto so ason no.

10.verse: Obiara a ɔhome wɔ Onyankopɔn mu no home fi n’ankasa ne nnwuma mu sɛnea Onyankopɔn home fii ne nnwuma mu no.

11.verse: Enti momma yɛmmɔ yɛn ho mmɔden na yɛatumi akɔ Onyankopɔn home mu. Ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛn mu bi yɛ asoɔden sɛnea wɔyɛɛ asoɔden a enti wɔankɔ mu no.

12.verse: Onyankopɔn asɛm te ase nnam so. Ɛyɛ nnam sen sekan anofanu. Etwa kosi baabi a honhom ne ɔkra hyia. Etwa kɔ baabi a apɔw ne dompe kyim hyia. Ebu nea nnipa adwene ne wɔn koma pɛ ho atɛn.

13.verse: Biribiara nni hɔ a wɔde sie Onyankopɔn ma ɛyɛ yie. Abɔde mu biribiara da n’anim na ɔno na ɛsɛ sɛ yebu yɛn ho akontaa kyerɛ no.

14.verse: Yesu yɛn Sɔfopanyin - Ɛno nti, momma yenso gyidi a yɛka ho asɛm no mu dennen. Efisɛ yɛwɔ Ɔsɔfopanyin kɛse Onyankopɔn Ba Yesu a wakɔ Onyankopɔn anim.

15.verse: Yɛn Sɔfo panyin no nyɛ obi a ontumi nte nka mma yɛn wɔ yɛn mmerɛwyɛ ho. Yɛwɔ obi a wɔasɔ no ahwɛ akwan horow nyinaa so sɛ yɛn ara nanso wanyɛ bɔne.

16.verse: Momma yensi yɛn bo na yɛmmra Onyankopɔn ahengua a adom wɔ mu no ho, na ɛno na ɛbɛma yɛanya ahummɔbɔ ne adom a ɛbɛboa yɛn bere a yɛn ho akyere yɛn no mu.

1.verse: Woyi ɔsɔfo panyin biara fi nnipa bi mu na wasi wɔn ananmu akyɛ ade, abɔ bɔne ho afɔre de asom Onyankopɔn.

2.verse: Esiane sɛ n’ankasa yɛ mmerɛw akwan horow pii so no nti, otumi tɔ ne bo ase ma wɔn a wonnim na wɔyɛ mfomso no.

3.verse: Na esiane sɛ ɔno ankasa yɛ mmerɛw nti, sɛ ɔrebɔ bɔne ho afɔre a, ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔbɔ ma nnipa a wɔayɛ bɔne nko na mmom ɔno ankasa ne bɔne nti.

4.verse: Obiara ntumi nyi ne ho mfa nhyɛ ne ho anuonyam sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsɔfo panyin. Onyankopɔn frɛ nko na onipa nam so bɛyɛ ɔsɔfo panyin sɛnea wɔfrɛɛ Aaron no.

5.verse: Saa ara nso na Kristo annye anto ne ho so sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsɔfo panyin amfa anhyɛ ne ho anuonyam. Na mmom, Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Woyɛ me Ba: ɛnnɛ, mayɛ w’agya.”

6.verse: Ɔsan kaa wɔ baabi foforo se, “Wobɛyɛ ɔsɔfo akosi daa sɛnea Melkisedek asɔfo kwan nhyehyɛe te no.”

7.verse: Yesu baa ɔhonam mu wɔ asase so no, ɔbɔɔ mpae nam nkotosrɛ so de n’abisade too Onyankopɔn a obetumi agye no afi owu mu no anim. Esiane sɛ odwo na ɔde ne ho nyinaa som no no nti, Onyankopɔn tiee no.

8.verse: Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba de, nanso ɔnam n’amanehunu so suaa ahobrɛase.

9.verse: Na owiee pɛyɛ no, wɔn a wotie no no nam ne so nya nkwagye a enni awiei,

10.verse: na Onyankopɔn ada no adi sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsɔfo panyin sɛnea Melkisedek asɔfo kwan nhyehyɛe te no.

11.verse: Yɛwɔ eyi ho nsɛm pii ka nanso emu kyerɛkyerɛ yɛ den, efisɛ, mo ntease yɛ den.

12.verse: Moayɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ adwuma no akyɛ nanso ɛsɛ sɛ munya obi ma ɔkyerɛkyerɛ mo Onyankopɔn ho asɛm fi ne mfitiase. Anka ɛsɛ sɛ saa bere yi mudi aduan a ɛyɛ den nanso nufusu na eye ma mo.

13.verse: Obiara a nufusu ye ma no da so yɛ abofra a onnim nea eye ne nea enye.

14.verse: Aduan a ɛyɛ den nso ye ma mpanyimfo a wɔatetew wɔn ma wɔnam nea ɛka wɔn ano no so hu papa ne bɔne ntam nsonoe.

1.verse: Momma yennyae Kristo ho nsɛm mfitase no, na yensua ne ho nsɛm a ɛkɔ anim no. Mommma yɛnntow ahonu a efi nneyɛe a ɛde kɔ owu mu ne Onyankopɔn mu gyidi no ho,

2.verse: ne asubɔ ne nsa a wɔde gu nnipa so ne awufo sɔre ne daa atemmu no fapem no nngu.

3.verse: Momma yɛnkɔ anim. Na sɛ Onyankopɔn ma kwan a, saa ara na yɛbɛyɛ.

4.verse: Ɔpo ho amanehunu - Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔbɛsan de wɔn a wɔahwe ase aba ama wɔanu wɔn ho bio? Na anka wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn hann mu. Wɔkaa ɔsoro akyɛde hwɛe na wonyaa wɔn kyɛfa wɔ Honhom Kronkron no mu.

5.verse: Wofi osuahu mu ahu sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm ye, na wɔahu mfe a ɛreba no mu tumi.

6.verse: Ɛno akyi, wɔhwee ase. Enti ɛyɛ den sɛ wɔde wɔn bɛsan aba bio sɛ wommenu wɔn ho, efisɛ, wɔresan abɔ Onyankopɔn Ba no asɛnnua mu nam so agu n’anim ase akyerɛ.

7.verse: Onyankopɔn hyira asase a ɛnom nsu a ɛtɔ gu so na ɛma ɛso afifide yɛ yie ma wɔn a wɔn nti woduae no.

8.verse: Na sɛ nsɔe ne wura hunu fifi so a, enye mma hwee. Onyankopɔn bɛdome no na wɔde ogya asɛe no.

9.verse: Nanso, me nnamfonom, nsɛm a yɛaka yi nyinaa akyi no, yenim pefee sɛ ade pa bi a nkwagye bata ho befi mo mu aba.

10.verse: Onyankopɔn nyɛ nea ɔnteɛ. Ne werɛ remfi adwuma a woyɛe anaa ɔdɔ a wodaa no adi maa no ne mmoa a wode boaa w’afɛfo Kristofo na wugu so de boa wɔn no.

11.verse: Nea yɛrehwehwɛ ne sɛ mo mu biara bɛtoa ne mmɔdemmɔ so de akosi awiei sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mo nsa bɛka ade a mo ani da so no.

12.verse: Yɛmpɛ sɛ moyɛ anihaw. Na mmom, yɛpɛ sɛ yehu mo sɛ gyidifo a mowɔ boasetɔ na mo nsa aka bɔ a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ mo no.

13.verse: Abraham so nhwɛso - Bere a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ Abraham bɔ no, ɔkaa nea wahyɛ ho bɔ no ho ntam. Esiane sɛ na obiara nni hɔ a ɔkorɔn sen no no nti, ɔde ɔno ara ne din na ɛkaa saa ntam no.

14.verse: Ɔkaa ntam no se, “Mehyɛ wo bɔ sɛ, mehyira wo na mama w’ase adɔ.”

15.verse: Na Abraham wɔ boasetɔ nti, ɛbɔ a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no, ne nsa kae.

16.verse: Sɛ onipa ka ntam a, ɔde obi a ɔkorɔn sen no din na ɛka saa ntam no de siesie nnipa ntam.

17.verse: Onyankopɔn pɛe sɛ ɔda no adi pefee kyerɛ wɔn a na ɛsɛ wɔn sɛ wɔn nsa ka ne bɔhyɛ no sɛ ɔrensesa n’atirimsɛm nti, ɔkaa ntam de hyɛɛ bɔhyɛ no den.

18.verse: Saa nneɛma abien yi na ɛrentumi nsesa a Onyankopɔn ntumi nni ho atoro. Enti yɛn a yɛnam ne so anya nkwa no, wɔhyɛ yɛn nkuran sɛ yenkita yɛn anidaso no mu dennen na yɛatumi adu saa anidaso no ho.

19.verse: Yɛwɔ saa anidaso yi sɛ sɛkyɛ wɔ yɛn koma mu. Etim hɔ na ɛhyɛn mu de kosi ntwamtam no mu.

20.verse: Yesu asi yɛn ananmu adi yɛn kan kɔ hɔ. Wayɛ ɔsɔfo panyin afebɔɔ sɛnea Melkisedek asɔfo kwan nhyehyɛe te no.

1.verse: Ɔkɛseɛ Melkisedek - Na saa Melkisedek yi yɛ Salemhene, ɛna ɔsan yɛ Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔnn sɔfo. Bere a Abraham fi ɔko a okum ahemfo ano reba no, Melkisedek hyiaa no hyiraa no.

2.verse: Abraham maa no n’asade no mu nkyɛm du mu baako. Melkisedek din no nkyerɛase a edi kan no ne Treneehene. Esiane sɛ na ɔyɛ Salemhene no nti, wɔkyerɛɛ ne din no ase se Asomdwoehene.

3.verse: Obi nnim Melkisedek n’agya, ne na, ne ne mpanyimfo ho asɛm. Saa ara nso na obi nnim n’awo ne ne wu nso ho asɛm. Ɔsɛ Onyankopɔn Ba, na ɔda so yɛ ɔsɔfo daadaa.

4.verse: Eyi di ho adanse sɛ na ɔyɛ onipa kɛse a agya Abraham po tumi ma no n’asade mu nkyɛm du mu baako.

5.verse: Nanso Lewi asefo a wɔyɛ asɔfo no Mmara na ɛhyɛ wɔn sɛ wonnye nkyɛm du mu baako mfi wɔn ara wɔn nkurɔfo Israelfo nkyɛn a wɔn nso yɛ Abraham asefo no.

6.verse: Melkisedek nyɛ Lewi aseni nanso ogyee nkyɛm du mu baako fii Abraham nkyɛn hyiraa no ma onyaa Onyankopɔn bɔhyɛ no.

7.verse: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ nea ɔma nhyira so sen nea ogye nhyira.

8.verse: Asɔfo mu no, nnipa a wowu no na wogye nkyɛm du no, nanso Melkisedek fam de, nea ɔte ase no na ogyee nkyɛm du no sɛnea Kyerɛwsɛm no ka no.

9.verse: Enti nokwarem, Abraham tuaa nkyɛm du no Lewi a n’asefo gye nkyɛm du no nso nam Abraham so tuae.

10.verse: Na wɔnwoo Lewi, nanso esiane sɛ na ɔhyɛ ne nena Abraham mu saa bere no a Melkisedek hyiaa no no nti na otuae.

11.verse: Ɛnam Lewi asɔfodi so nti na wɔde Mmara no maa Israelfo. Ɛno nti sɛ Lewifo asɔfo no yɛɛ wɔn adwuma yiye a, anka ɛho nhia sɛ wɔbɛfa ɔsɔfo foforo bi afi Melkisedek abusua mu a omfi Aaron abusua mu.

12.verse: Sɛ ɛba sɛ asɔfodi no sesa a, ɛma mmara no nso sesa.

13.verse: Nanso yɛn Awurade a wɔka saa asɛm yi nyinaa fa ne ho no fi abuasua foforo mu. Ne busuani biara nnii ɔsɔfo wɔ afɔremuka so da.

14.verse: Ɛyɛ sɛnnahɔ sɛ wɔwoo no too Yuda abusua mu, na Mose kaa asɔfo ho asɛm no nso, wammɔ n’abusua din da.

15.verse: Asɛm no da ne ho adi pefee, efisɛ, ɔsɔfo foforo bi aba a ɔte sɛ Melkisedek.

16.verse: Ɔno de, ɛnnam onipa mmara so na wɔhyɛɛ no ɔsɔfo.

17.verse: Kyerɛwsɛm no ka se, ‘Wobɛyɛ ɔsɔfo daa nyinaa sɛnea Melkisedek asɔfo kwan nhyehyɛe te no.’”

18.verse: Wɔatow mmara dedaw no akyene, efisɛ, na emu yɛ mmerɛw na ɛho nni mfaso nso.

19.verse: Na Mose Mmara no nso antumi amma biribiara anyɛ pɛ. Wɔde anidaso pa bi a yɛnam so bɛn Onyankopɔn aba.

20.verse: Ɛno akyi, Onyankopɔn ntam abɛka ho. Bere a wɔhyɛɛ afoforo bi asɔfo no na ntam a ɛte saa nni hɔ.

21.verse: Yesu nam ntam so bɛyɛɛ ɔsɔfo bere a Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Awurade aka ntam; na ɔrensesa n’adwene: ‘Wobɛyɛ ɔsɔfo daa nyinaa.’“

22.verse: Saa nsonoe yi na ɛma Yesu gyina pintinn ma apam no.

23.verse: Nsonoe foforo bi nso wɔ hɔ. Na saa asɔfo no dɔɔso, efisɛ, na wowuwu a wontumi ntoa wɔn adwuma so.

24.verse: Nanso Yesu de, ɔwɔ hɔ daa na n’asɔfodwuma no nso, obi ntoa so mma no.

25.verse: Enti otumi gye wɔn a wɔnam ne so ba Onyankopɔn nkyɛn no ɛnnɛ ne daa, efisɛ, ɔte hɔ daa srɛ Onyankopɔn ma wɔn.

26.verse: Yesu ne ɔsɔfo panyin a ɔboa yɛn wɔ yɛn ahiasɛm mu. Ɔyɛ kronkron. Onni mfomso biara wɔ ne mu na ɔnyɛ bɔne. Wɔatew no afi nnebɔneyɛfo ho na wɔapagyaw no aboro ɔsoro so.

27.verse: Ɔnte sɛ asɔfo mpanyin a aka no a, daa afɔrebɔ a ɔbɔ no kan no ɔbɔ wɔ ne bɔne a wayɛ ho ansa na afei wabɔ afoforo de no. Ɔbɔɔ afɔre baako pɛ a ɔde ne ho na ɛbɔe.

28.verse: Mose Mmara no yi nnipa a wɔmfata ma wɔyɛ asɔfo mpanyin, nanso Onyankopɔn bɔ a ɔde ntam kaa ho no a ɛbae Mmara no akyi no, yii Ɔba no a ɔyɛ pɛ daa nyinaa no.

1.verse: Wɔde Kristo bɔɔ afɔre - Asɛm a yegyina so kasa no ne sɛ: Yɛwɔ ɔsɔfo panyin a ɔte Otumfo a ɔwɔ soro no ahengua no nifa so.

2.verse: Ɔsom sɛ ɔsɔfo panyin wɔ Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ a ɛkyerɛ ntamadan a Awurade no ankasa sii a ɛnyɛ onipa na osii.

3.verse: Woyi ɔsɔfo panyin biara sɛ ɔmfa akyerɛde ne mmoa mmɔ Onyankopɔn afɔre. Ɛno nti ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn sɔfo panyin nya biribi a ɔde bɛbɔ afɔre.

4.verse: Sɛ ɔwɔ asase so a, anka ɔrenyɛ ɔsɔfo koraa efisɛ, asɔfo wɔ hɔ a wɔde akyɛde ma sɛnea Yudafo mmara kyerɛ no.

5.verse: Dwuma a wodi sɛ asɔfo no yɛ ɔsoro nsusuwso bi kwa. Ɛte sɛ Mose bere so de no ara pɛ. Bere a ɔpɛe sɛ osi ntamadan no, Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Si no sɛnea wɔkyerɛɛ wo bepɔw no so sɛ yɛ no no pɛpɛɛpɛ.”

6.verse: Nanso wɔama Yesu asɔfodwuma a ɛso kyɛn wɔn de no te sɛ apam a ne nti, Onyankopɔn ne nnipa pamee, efisɛ, wofi bɔhyɛ pa mu na ɛpam saa apam no.

7.verse: Sɛ na apam a edi kan no ye a, anka ɛho nhia sɛ wɔbɛyɛ apam a ɛto so abien no.

8.verse: Nanso Onyankopɔn nyaa ne nkurɔfo ho mfaso na ɔkae se, “Nna bi reba, Awurade na ose, a me ne Israelfo ne Yuda abusuakuw bɛhyehyɛ apam foforo.

9.verse: Ɛrenyɛ sɛ apam a me ne wɔn mpanyimfo hyehyɛe wɔ da a misoo wɔn nsa dii wɔn anim fii Misraim no. Wɔanni apam a me ne wɔn hyehyɛe no ho nokware, ɛno nti mantew m’ani anhwɛ wɔn, Awurade na ose.

10.verse: Afei, eyi ne apam a me ne Israelfo bɛhyehyɛ bere a ɛreba no mu, Awurade na ose: Mede me mmara bɛhyɛ wɔn adwenem na makyerɛw agu wɔn komam. Mɛyɛ wɔn Nyankopɔn na wɔayɛ me nkurɔfo.

11.verse: Wɔn mu biara renka nkyerɛ ne yɔnko anaa ne kuromni se, ‘Hu Awurade!’ Efisɛ, wɔn nyinaa nim me fi akumaa so kosi ɔkɛse so.

12.verse: Mehu wɔn mmɔbɔ wɔn bɔne ho; na merenkae wɔn bɔne bio.”

13.verse: Nhyehyɛe dedaw no - Frɛ a wɔfrɛ saa apam yi “Foforo” no, ama nea wɔyɛe kan no ayɛ dedaw; na biribiara a enyin yɛ dedaw no nkyɛ yera.

1.verse: Na apam a edi kan no wɔ mmara a wɔnam so som. Saa ara nso na na wɔwɔ beae a nnipa asiesie a wɔsom.

2.verse: Wosii ntamadan a na wɔfrɛ saa ntamadan no akyiri Kronkonbea. Na Kanea dua, ɔpon ne abodoo a wɔatew ho a wɔde ma Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ.

3.verse: Ntwamu a ɛto so abien no akyi na ntamadan bi wɔ a wɔfrɛ hɔ Kronkron mu Kronkron

4.verse: a sika aduhuamhyew afɔremuka ne apam adaka a wɔde sika adura ho nyinaa wɔ. Saa adaka no mu na na sika pɔre a mana ne Aaron poma a ɛfefɛwee ne apam abopon no wɔ.

5.verse: Adaka no so hɔ nso na Onuonyamfo Kerubim a watrɛw ne ntaban mu akata baabi a na wɔde bɔne kyɛ no si. Nanso yɛrentumi nka nneɛma no ho asɛm nkɔ akyiri mprempren.

6.verse: Saa na wɔahyehyɛ nneɛma no. Da biara na asɔfo no kɔ ntamadan no akyi kɔyɛ wɔn adwuma;

7.verse: nanso na ɔsofɔ panyin no nko ara na ɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔkɔ ntamadan no mu pɛnkoro pɛ afe biara. Ɔde mogya a ɔde bɔ Onyankopɔn afɔre ma ne ho ne bɔne a nnipa ayɛ a na wonnim sɛ wɔreyɛ bɔne no ka ne ho kɔ.

8.verse: Honhom Kronkron no nam saa kwan yi so kyerɛ yɛn sɛ, ɔkwan dedaw no, na nnipa a wonni mu ntumi nkɔ Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ bere a ɔdan a ɛwɔ akyiri no ne nneɛma a egyina hɔ ma no no nyinaa da so wɔ hɔ.

9.verse: Ɛyɛ mfatoho ma nnɛ bere yi. Ɛkyerɛ sɛ akyɛde ne mmoa a na wɔde bɔ afɔre ma Onyankopɔn no ntumi mma wɔn a wɔsom no koma mu nyɛ kronn.

10.verse: Wɔde nnuan, anonne ne nneɛma ahorow a wɔde dwira wɔn ho na na edi dwuma no. Eyi yɛ mmara a enni mu kosi bere a Onyankopɔn bɛsesɛw ne nyinaa.

11.verse: Nanso Kristo aba dedaw sɛ ɔsɔfo panyin ama nneɛma pa a yɛwɔ dedaw yi. Ntamadan a ɔsom wɔ mu no so na edi mu kyɛn dedaw no. Ɛnyɛ nnipa na wɔyɛe a enti ɛkyerɛ sɛ, ɛnyɛ wiase fa bi.

12.verse: Bere a Kristo kɔɔ ntamadan no mu a ɔkɔɔ Kronkronbea hɔ pɛnkoro no, wamfo mmirekyi ne anantwi mogya na ɛkɔbɔɔ afɔre. Mmom ɔno ara de ne mogya na ɛbɔɔ afɔre de gyee nkwa a enni awiei maa yɛn.

13.verse: Nhyehyɛe foforo no - Na sɛ mmirekyi ne anantwinini mogya ne nantwibere nso a wɔde dwira wɔn a wɔn ho agu fi tew wɔn ho kɔ honam ahofi mu a,

14.verse: mpɛn ahe na Kristo a ɔnam Honhom a ɛte hɔ daa so de ne ho bɔɔ afɔre a ɛho nni dɛm maa Onyankopɔn no mogya rentew mo ho mfi nnwuma bɔne mu nkɔsom Onyankopɔn a ɔte ase no?

15.verse: Eyi nti na Kristo na ɔhyehyɛ apam foforo sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn a Onyankopɔn afrɛ wɔn no benya nhyira a enni awiei sɛnea Onyankopɔn ahyɛ bɔ no. Eyi betumi aba saa, efisɛ, owu bi asi a egye nnipa fi wɔn bɔne a wɔyɛe bere a na wɔwɔ apam a edi kan no mu no.

16.verse: Sɛ nsamansew bi wɔ hɔ a , gye sɛ wotumi ma nokware no da adi sɛ onipa a ɔhyɛɛ saa nsamansew no awu.

17.verse: Sɛ onipa a ɔhyɛ nsamansew no te ase a, saa nsamansew no nka hwee. Bere a wawu no na ɛka biribi.

18.verse: Ɛno nti na apam a edi kan no wɔnam mogya so na ɛhyɛɛ no den no.

19.verse: Nea edi kan no, Mose kaa mmaransɛm no nyinaa sɛnea ɛwɔ Mmara no mu no kyerɛɛ nnipa no. Nantwi mma mogya ne nsu ne kuntu kɔkɔɔ ne sommɛ na ɔde petee Mmara nhoma no ne nnipa no nyinaa so

20.verse: kae se, “Eyi ne mogya a ɛsɔw apam a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ mo sɛ munni so no ano.”

21.verse: Saa ara na Mose nso petee mogya guu ntamadan no ne nneɛma a wɔde som no nyinaa so nen.

22.verse: Nokwarem, sɛnea Mmara no kyerɛ no, ɛkame ayɛ sɛ mogya na etumi tew ade nyinaa ho na saa ara nso na gye sɛ mogya hwie gu ansa na bɔnefafiri aba.

23.verse: Saa kwan yi ara so na wɔnam ma biribiara a ɛyɛ ɔsoro nhwɛsode no ho tew. Nanso ɔsoro nneɛma no ankasa de, afɔre a eye kyɛn eyinom na wɔde tew ho.

24.verse: Efisɛ, Kristo ankɔ baabi a ɛyɛ kronn a nnipa de wɔn nsa na ayɛ a ɛyɛ ade kann nhwɛsode. Ɔkɔɔ soro ankasa na osi yɛn ananmu wɔ hɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.

25.verse: Afe biara Yudafo sɔfo panyin de aboa mogya kɔ Kronkronbea hɔ. Nanso Kristo amfa ne ho amma mpɛn bebree saa.

26.verse: Sɛ ɔyɛɛ saa a, anka efi adebɔ mfiase no obehu amane mpɛn bebree. Mmom, waba prɛko a nneɛma nyinaa reba awiei, nam ne ho a ɔde bɔɔ afɔre no so apopa bɔne.

27.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara wu baako pɛ na ɛno akyi Onyankopɔn abu no atɛn.

28.verse: Saa ara na wɔde Kristo nso bɔɔ afɔre baako pɛ de gyee dodow no ara wɔ wɔn bɔne mu. Ɔbɛba ne mprenu so a ommegye nnebɔneyɛfo na mmom ɔbɛba abegye wɔn a wɔretwɛn no no nkwa.

1.verse: Nsonoe a ɛda foforo ne dedaw no mu - Mmara no yɛ nneɛma pa nsusuwso a ɛreba na mmom ɛnyɛ nneɛma pa no ankasa. Wɔbɔ afɔre koro no ara afe biara. Na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na saa Mmara yi nam afɔre a wɔbɔ yi so ama nnipa a wɔba Onyankopɔn nkyɛn no ayɛ pɛ?

2.verse: Sɛ nnipa a wɔresom Onyankopɔn no fi wɔn bɔne mu ayɛ pɛ a, ɛnne wɔrenni bɔne ho fɔ bio na ne saa nti, afɔrebɔ nyinaa to betwa.

3.verse: Saa afɔrebɔ no kae wɔn wɔn bɔne afe biara.

4.verse: Anantwi ne mmirekyi mogya rentumi mpopa bɔne.

5.verse: Esiane saa nti, bere a Kristo rebɛba wiase no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn se, “Wompɛ afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛde nanso woasiesie ɔhonam ama me.

6.verse: W’ani nnye ɔhyew ne bɔne afɔre anaa afɔre a wɔbɔ de popa bɔne ho.

7.verse: Afei mekae se, ‘Mewɔ ha, rebɛyɛ nea wopɛ sɛ meyɛ sɛnea wɔakyerɛw afa me ho wɔ Mmara nhoma no mu no.’ “

8.verse: Kan no, ɔkae se, “Wompɛ, na w’ani nso nnye afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛde anaa ɔhyew afɔre ne ayɛyɛde a wɔde popa bɔne ho.” Ɛwom na Mmara no kyerɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ saa.

9.verse: Na ɔkae se, “Mewɔ ha rebɛyɛ nea wopɛ sɛ meyɛ.” Ɛno nti, Onyankopɔn agu tete afɔrebɔ no nyinaa na ɔde Kristo afɔrebɔ no asi ananmu.

10.verse: Esiane sɛ Yesu Kristo yɛɛ sɛnea Onyankopɔn hwehwɛ sɛ ɔnyɛ no nti, ɔnam ne honam a ɔde bɔɔ afɔre prɛko maa yɛn no so ama yɛn ho atew afi bɔne ho.

11.verse: Da biara Yudani ɔsɔfo sɔre yɛ n’asɔfodwuma na wabɔ afɔre mpɛn pii. Nanso saa afɔre yi rentumi mpopa bɔne.

12.verse: Kristo de, ɔbɔɔ bɔne ho afɔre. Afɔre a ɛtena daa nyinaa. Na ɛno akyi, ɔtenaa Onyankopɔn nifa so.

13.verse: Ɛhɔ na ɔretwɛn mprempren kosi sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛma n’atamfo ayɛ ne nan ase ntiaso.

14.verse: Ɔnam afɔrebɔ baako so ama nnebɔneyɛfo ho atew daa nyinaa.

15.verse: Na Honhom Kronkron no nso di adanse. Nea edi kan no, ɛka se,

16.verse: “Eyi ne apam a me ne wɔn bɛpam wɔ bere a ɛreba no mu, Awurade na ose: Mede me mmara bɛhyɛ wɔn koma mu na makyerɛw agu wɔn adwene mu.”

17.verse: Na afei waka se, “Merenkae wɔn bɔne ne wɔn amumɔyɛ bio.”

18.verse: Sɛ wɔde eyinom nyinaa kyɛ a, na afɔre a wɔbɔ de popa bɔne no ho nhia bio.

19.verse: Momma yɛmmɛn Onyankopɔn - Anuanom, esiane Yesu wu no nti, yɛade yɛn ho koraa sɛ yɛbɛkɔ Kronkronbea hɔ.

20.verse: Ɔnam ɔno ara ne honam so abue kwan foforo a nkwa wɔ mu ama yɛn.

21.verse: Yɛwɔ ɔsɔfo kɛse bi a ɔhwɛ Onyankopɔn fi so.

22.verse: Momma yɛmfa koma pa, gyidi a emu yɛ den, koma a esiane atiboa bɔne nti, wɔatew ho ne honam a wɔde nsu a ɛyɛ kronn aguare no ntwiw mmɛn Onyankopɔn.

23.verse: Momma yennyina gyidi a yɛaso mu no mu dennen, efisɛ, yɛde yɛn ho to Onyankopɔn so sɛ ɔrenni yɛn hwammɔ.

24.verse: Dwen papayɛ ho - Momma yɛn ho yɛn ho asɛm nhia yɛn na yɛnnodɔ yɛn ho yɛn ho na yɛnyɛ papa.

25.verse: Mommma yennnyae yɛn ho yɛn ho nhyiam da sɛnea afoforo bi yɛ no. Mmom, momma yɛnhyɛ yɛn ho yɛn ho nkuran denneennen, efisɛ, mo ara muhu sɛ ɛrenkyɛ na ɛda no aba.

26.verse: Sɛ moboapa kɔ so yɛ bɔne a, afɔrebɔ biara nni hɔ a ɛbɛpopa mo bɔne, efisɛ, wɔada nokware no adi akyerɛ yɛn.

27.verse: Nea aka ara ne sɛ obiara suro nea ɛbɛba a ɛyɛ atemmu ne ogya a ɛbɛba abɛhyew wɔn a wotia Onyankopɔn no.

28.verse: Obiara a obu Mose Mmara no so no, sɛ adansefo baanu anaa baasa adansedi nti, wobu atɛn tia no a, wobekum no a wɔrenhu no mmɔbɔ.

29.verse: Na obi a watiatia Onyankopɔn Ba no so, na ɔmfa Onyankopɔn mogya apam no a egyee no fii bɔne mu no nyɛ hwee anaa nea otiatia Honhom a ɛma adom no anim no, ɛdɛn na ɛbɛto no? Asotwe a onii no benya no nyɛ adewa.

30.verse: Efisɛ, yenim nea ɔkae se, “Mɛtɔ were, na metua ka,” na ɔno ara na ɔsan kae se, “Awurade bebu ne nkurɔfo atɛn.”

31.verse: Onyankopɔn a ɔte ase no nsam amanenya yɛ hu.

32.verse: Monkae tebea a na mowɔ mu tete no. Saa bere no, sɛ Onyankopɔn hann tɔ mo so na ɔhaw pii to mo a, na ɔpere a mopere no ntumi nni saa ɔhaw no so.

33.verse: Ebi ne sɛ, mpɛn pii wɔyaw mo, gu mo anim ase baguam; na ɛtɔ da bi mpo a, na moasiesie mo ho sɛ mobɛka wɔn a wɔreyɛ wɔn saa no ho.

34.verse: Mo ne nneduafo daa afiase na wɔfaa mo ahode nyinaa no mpo, munyaa ho boasetɔ, efisɛ, munim sɛ ɛyɛ dɛn ara a, mowɔ ade pa bi a ɛbɛtena hɔ daa.

35.verse: Mommma mo koma nntu na moanhwere mo akatua.

36.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ motɔ mo bo ase na moatumi ayɛ Onyankopɔn apɛde ama mo nsa aka nea wɔahyɛ mo ho bɔ no.

37.verse: Efisɛ, Kyerɛwsɛm no ka se, “Ɛrenkyɛ koraa na nea ɛsɛ sɛ ɔba no aba; ɔrentwentwɛn.

38.verse: M’atreneefo begye adi na wɔatena ase na sɛ wɔn mu bi dan n’akyi kyerɛ a, m’ani rennye ne ho.

39.verse: Yɛnyɛ nnipa a yɛdan yɛn akyi kyerɛ na yɛyera. Mmom, yɛwɔ gyidi nti wɔagye yɛn nkwa.

1.verse: Gyidi - Gyidi yɛ ahotoso a yɛwɔ wɔ nneɛma a yɛn ani da so ne nneɛma a yenhu ho adansedi mu.

2.verse: Gyidi a na tetefo no wɔ nti na Onyankopɔn gyee wɔn too mu.

3.verse: Gyidi na ɛma yɛte ase sɛ ɛnam Onyankopɔn asɛm so na wɔbɔɔ wiase sɛnea ɛbɛma yɛahu sɛ wɔbɔɔ nea wohu fii nea wonhu mu.

4.verse: Gyidi nti na Habel bɔɔ afɔre a ɛsɔ ani kyɛn Kain de de maa Onyankopɔn no. Ne gyidi a ɔwɔ nti, Onyankopɔn buu no sɛ onipa trenee, efisɛ, n’akyɛde no sɔɔ Onyankopɔn ani. Esiane Habel gyidi a na ɔwɔ nti, ɛwom sɛ wawu de, nanso ɔda so kasa.

5.verse: Gyidi a na Henok wɔ nti, wɔfaa no kɔe a wanhu owu. Obiara anhu no, efisɛ, Onyankopɔn na ɔfaa no. Kyerɛwsɛm no ka se ansa na wɔrebɛfa Henok akɔ no, na wasɔ Onyankopɔn ani.

6.verse: Obiara a onni gyidi rentumi nsɔ Onyankopɔn ani. Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔba Onyankopɔn nkyɛn no nya gyidi sɛ Onyankopɔn te ase na ɔdom wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ no.

7.verse: Gyidi nti na ɛmaa Noah tee Onyankopɔn kɔkɔ a ɔbɔ faa daakye nneɛma a anka ɔrentumi nhu no ho no. Otiee Onyankopɔn yɛɛ adaka a emu na wogyee ɔne ne fifo nkwa. Ɛnam so ma obuu wiase fɔ enti onyaa gyidi mu trenee.

8.verse: Gyidi nti na bere a Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Abraham se ɔnkɔ asase a wahyɛ ho bɔ sɛ ɔde bɛma no so no, otiee, na ɔkɔe. Ogyaw ne man hɔ kɔe a na onnim baabi a ɔrekɔ.

9.verse: Gyidi nti ɔtenaa asase a na Onyankopɔn ahyɛ no ho bɔ no so sɛ ɔhɔho. Ɔne Isak ne Yakob a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn bɔ koro no ara bi tenaa ntamadan mu.

10.verse: Nanso na Abraham retwɛn kurow kɛse bi a Onyankopɔn akyekyere a ne fapem rensɛe da mu akɔtena.

11.verse: Gyidi nti na Abraham yɛɛ agya wɔ ne nkwakoraa bere mu a, na ne yere Sara anyin yiye nti, na ɔnwo no. Ɔde ne ho too Onyankopɔn so sɛ obedi ne bɔhyɛ so.

12.verse: Ɛwom sɛ na ɔregye nna awu, nanso n’asefo dɔɔso sɛ wim nsoromma ne mpoano anhwea.

13.verse: Gyidi mu na saa nnipa yi nyinaa wuwui. Ɛwom sɛ wɔn nsa anka bɔ a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn no de, nanso wohuu no, akyirikyiri yɛɛ no atuu gye dii sɛ wɔyɛ ahɔho ne amamfrafo wɔ asase so.

14.verse: Wɔn a wɔka saa no da no adi pefee sɛ wɔrehwehwɛ wɔn ankasa wɔn man.

15.verse: Wonnwen ɔman a wɔagyaw wɔ wɔn akyi no ho. Sɛ wɔyɛɛ no saa a, anka wobetumi anya kwan asan wɔn akyi akɔ hɔ.

16.verse: Ɔman pa a ɛyɛ ɔsoro man no na wɔpere kɔ mu. Enti ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn aniwu sɛ ɔma wɔfrɛ no wɔn Nyankopɔn, efisɛ, wasiesie ɔman bi ama wɔn.

17.verse: Gyidi a Abraham wɔ nti na ɛmaa Onyankopɔn maa Abraham de ne ba Isak kɔbɔɔ afɔre de sɔɔ no hwɛe. Abraham nko ara ne onipa a na Onyankopɔn ahyɛ no bɔ no, nanso na wasiesie ne ho sɛ, ɔde ne ba koro no bɛbɔ afɔre.

18.verse: Na Onyankopɔn aka akyerɛ no se, “Ɛnam Isak so na w’ase atrɛw.”

19.verse: Na Abraham bu no sɛ Onyankopɔn betumi anyan Isak afi owu mu nanso abebu mu no, onyanee no fii owu mu.

20.verse: Gyidi nti na ɛmaa Isak hyiraa Yakob ne Esau maa wɔn daakye asetena.

21.verse: Gyidi nti na ɛmaa Yakob hyiraa Yosef mma no nyinaa ansa na ɔrewu no. Otwerii ne poma so na ɔsɔree Onyankopɔn.

22.verse: Gyidi nti na Yosef rebewu no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Israelfo se, wontu mfi Misraim na ɔhyɛɛ nea sɛ owu a wɔnyɛ n’amu no no.

23.verse: Gyidi nti na ɛmaa Mose awo akyi n’awofo de no siee abosom abiɛsa no. Wohuu sɛ na ne ho yɛ fɛ enti na wonsuro sɛ wobebu ɔhene no mmara so.

24.verse: Gyidi nti na Mose nyinii no wampɛ sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no Farao babea ba no.

25.verse: Na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne Onyankopɔn mma behu amane sen sɛ obegye n’ani wɔ bɔne mu mmere tiaa bi.

26.verse: Osusuwii sɛ, sɛ ohu amane ma Agyenkwa no a, eye sen agyapade a ɛwɔ Misraim nyinaa, efisɛ, na n’ani da ade pa bi so daakye.

27.verse: Gyidi nti na ɛmaa Mose tu fii Misraim a na onsuro ɔhene no abufuw. Omiaa n’ani sɛ ɔrensan n’akyi te sɛ nea wahu Onyankopɔn a obi nhu no no.

28.verse: Gyidi nti na ɔhyɛɛ Twam Afahyɛ no ma wɔde mogya petee apon ho sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔsɛebɔfo no renkum Israelfo mmakan a wɔyɛ mmarima no.

29.verse: Gyidi nti na ɛmaa Israelfo no twaa Po Kɔkɔɔ no sɛnea wɔnam asase kesee so no. Misraimfo no pɛe sɛ wotwa bi no, nsu no bu faa wɔn so.

30.verse: Gyidi nti na Israelfo de nnansɔn twaa Yeriko afasu ho hyiae no, edwiriw gui.

31.verse: Gyidi nti na wankum aguaman Rahab amfra wɔn a wonnye Onyankopɔn nni no, efisɛ, ogyee akwansrafo no fɛw so.

32.verse: Gyidi foforo bi - Afei dɛn na menka? Bere pii nni hɔ sɛ mɛka Gideon, Barak, Samson, Yefta, Dawid ne Samuel ne adiyifo no ho asɛm.

33.verse: Wɔnam gyidi so koo aman so dii nkonim. Wɔyɛɛ ade pa nyaa nea Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn ho bɔ no. Wɔkataa gyata ano,

34.verse: dum ogyaframa, tetew wɔn ho fii nkrantewu ano. Na wɔyɛ mmerɛw nanso wɔyɛɛ den. Na wɔyɛ den akono, enti wodii wɔn atamfo so.

35.verse: Ɛnam gyidi mu wonyanee mmea bi awufo maa wɔn. Afoforo bi a wɔpɛɛ ahofadi nso, wɔyɛɛ wɔn aninyaade, kum wɔn na daakye wɔanya asetena pa.

36.verse: Woguu afoforo anim ase, bɔɔ wɔn mmaa, na wɔkyekyeree ebinom de wɔn guu afiase.

37.verse: Wosiw ebi abo. Wɔde sradaa paee ebinom mu abien, de sekan kum bi. Wokyinkyinii sɛ nnipa a nguan ne mmirekyi nhoma kata wɔn ho a wɔyɛɛ mmɔbɔ na wɔn ho guan wɔn na wohuu amane.

38.verse: Wiase ne wɔn anni no yiye koraa. Wokyinkyinii sɛ atutenafo wɔ sare so ne mmepɔw so, abodan ne asase so abon mu.

39.verse: Wodi eyinom nyinaa ho adanse pa wɔ wɔn gyidi ho nanso wɔn nsa anka bɔ a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn no,

40.verse: efisɛ, Onyankopɔn ayɛ nhyehyɛe a eye sen eyi na ɔrenkwati yɛn wɔ ne pɛyɛ mu.

1.verse: Yɛn agya Nyankopɔn - Yɛn de, yɛwɔ adansefo bebree a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia. Momma yɛntwe yɛn ho mfi akwansiwde nyinaa ne bɔne a akyekyere yɛn denneenen no nyinaa ho na yɛnyere yɛn ho ntu mmirikakansi a ɛda yɛn anim no.

2.verse: Momma yɛmfa yɛn ani nto Yesu a yɛn gyidi mfitiase ne n’awiei gyina ne so no so. Asɛnnua no nti, wampa abaw. Esiane anigye a na ɛretwɛn no no nti, animguasewu a owuu wɔ asɛnnua so no anhaw no. Enti mprempren ɔte Onyankopɔn ahengua no nifa so.

3.verse: Dwen ɔhaw a ɔfaa mu no ho sɛ nnipa nnebɔneyɛfo tan a wɔtan no nso, otumi gyinaa ano no. Ɛno nti mommpa abaw.

4.verse: Na sɛ moko tia bɔne a, na monko ntiaa sɛ mo mogya begu.

5.verse: Onyankopɔn asotwe fata yɛn - Mo werɛ afi nkuranhyɛsɛm a Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ mo sɛ ne mma no se, “Me ba, sɛ Awurade twe w’aso a, tie no yiye, na sɛ ɔka w’anim a, mpa abaw.

6.verse: Efisɛ, obiara a Awurade pɛ n’asɛm no, na ɔtwe n’aso, na nea ɔfa no sɛ ɔba no, na ɔhwe no mmaa.”

7.verse: Amanehunu biara a ɛbɛto mo no, munnhinhim na momfa no sɛ Agya no nteɛso, efisɛ, mo amanehunu no kyerɛ nteɛso a Onyankopɔn reteɛ mo so sɛ ne mma. Ɔba bi wɔ hɔ a n’agya nteɛ ne so da?

8.verse: Sɛ wanteɛ mo so sɛ ne mma no bi a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ monyɛ ne mma kann.

9.verse: Sɛ yɛn agyanom a wɔwɔ asase so twee yɛn aso ma yebuu wɔn a, mpɛn ahe na ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛbrɛ yɛn ho ase ma honhom mu Agya no na yetumi tena ase?

10.verse: Yɛn agyanom a wɔwɔ asase so ha twee yɛn aso sɛnea wɔpɛ bere tiaa bi. Nanso yɛn yiyedi nti, Onyankopɔn yɛɛ saa sɛnea yɛn ho bɛtew.

11.verse: Sɛ wɔtwe yɛn aso a, ɛma yɛn werɛ how saa bere no mu na yɛn ani nnye. Na akyiri yi no, wɔn a wɔnam saa asotwe no so nya wɔn ho ntease no sow asomdwoe aba, tena ase trenee mu.

12.verse: Monteɛteɛ nsa ne nkotodwe a emu agugow no mu.

13.verse: Munsiesie akwan na momfa so, na mpakye anyɛ mmubuafo, na mmom wɔasa wɔn yare.

14.verse: Mo ne nnipa nyinaa ntena ase asomdwoe mu, na mommɔ mmɔden ntena ase trenee mu. Anyɛ saa a, morenhu Awurade.

15.verse: Monhwɛ yiye na mo mu bi annan n’akyi ankyerɛ Onyankopɔn adom no. Monhwɛ yiye na mo mu bi anyɛ sɛ afifide a ɛyɛ nwene a enyin ma ne bɔnwema no haw afoforo.

16.verse: Monhwɛ yiye na mo mu bi anyɛ nguamanfo ne obi a ɔmfɛre Onyankopɔn sɛ Esau a obuu n’ani guu n’agyapade so tɔn n’abakan de gyee aduan no.

17.verse: Na afei eduu bere bi a ɔpɛe sɛ ne nsa ka n’agya hɔ nhyira no, ɔde kamee no no. Ɛwom sɛ ɔde nisu peree sɛ wanya adwensakra de, nanso anyɛ ye.

18.verse: Onyankopɔn anuonyam - Munhyiaa nneɛma a ɛyɛ hu, ogyaframa, awerɛhow, esum ne ahum sɛnea Israelfo no hyiae Sinai bepɔw no so bere a Onyankopɔn de ne mmara no mae no.

19.verse: Efisɛ, na wɔrebɔ torobɛnto denneenen a ɛnne bi a ɛreka kasa a ɛyɛ hu nenam mu enti nnipa no srɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ onnyae kasa,

20.verse: efisɛ, na wontumi nni mmara a na ɛka se, “Sɛ mpo aboa koraa de ne ho ka bepɔw no a, ɛsɛ sɛ wosiw no abo kum no” no so.

21.verse: Na beae hɔ yɛ hu ara kosii sɛ Mose kae se, “Misuro, na me ho popo.”

22.verse: Na mo de, moaba Sion Bepɔw so ne Onyankopɔn a ɔte ase no kurow, ɔsoro soro Yerusalem a ɔsoro abɔfo mpempem wɔ mu no mu.

23.verse: Moaba Onyankopɔn asafo mma dedaw a, wɔn ani gye wɔn ho a wɔakyerɛw wɔn din wɔ soro no mu. Moaba Onyankopɔn a ɔyɛ nnipa nyinaa temmufo ne atreneefo a wɔayɛ wɔn pɛ no mu.

24.verse: Moaba Yesu a ɔhyehyɛɛ apam foforo ne mogya a wɔapete a ɛka nneɛma pa ho asɛm sen Habel mogya no ho.

25.verse: Monhwɛ mo ho so yiye na moammu mo ani angu asɛm a ɔka so. Wɔn a wɔkaa Asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ wɔn na wɔantie no anguan. Na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛatumi aguan afi nea ɔkasa fi soro ho?

26.verse: Ne nne wosow asase saa bere no, nanso mprempren wahyɛ bɔ sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ asase nko na mɛsan awosow no, na mɛwosow soro nso bio saa ara.”

27.verse: Nsɛm “Nso bio saa ara” no da no adi pefee sɛ ɔbɛwosow nneɛma a wɔbɔe no na atutu afi wɔn ananmu na nneɛma a wɔanwosow no no aka.

28.verse: Momma yɛnna so ase, efisɛ, yɛanya ahenni a wɔwosow no a ɛnyɛ ye. Momma yɛn ani nsɔ na yɛmfa ɔkwan a ɛbɛsɔ Onyankopɔn ani a ɛyɛ nidi ne suro so nsom no,

29.verse: efisɛ, nokware, yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ ogya a ɛhyew na ɛsɛe ade.

1.verse: Mmara ne nkyia - Monnodɔ mo ho mo ho sɛ anuanom wɔ Kristo mu.

2.verse: Monkae na munnye ahɔho wɔ mo afi mu. Ebinom yɛɛ saa nam so gyee abɔfo a na wonnim.

3.verse: Monkae wɔn a wɔda afiase na momfa no sɛ mo ne wɔn na ɛda hɔ. Monkae wɔn a wɔrehu amane na momfa no sɛ mo ne wɔn na ɛrehu saa amane no.

4.verse: Mo nyinaa munni aware ni na okununom ne ɔyerenom nni wɔn ho nokware, efisɛ, Onyankopɔn bebu aguamanfo ne awaresɛefo atɛn.

5.verse: Munyi sikanibere mfi mo abrabɔ mu, na momma mo ani nsɔ nea mo nsa ka. Efisɛ Onyankopɔn aka se, “Merennyaw wo, na merennyaw wo da.”

6.verse: Momma yensi yɛn bo nka se, “Awurade ne me boafo, merensuro. Ɛdɛn na onipa betumi ayɛ me?”

7.verse: Monkae mo mpanyimfo a wodii mo anim a wɔkaa Onyankopɔn asɛm kyerɛɛ mo no. Monkae ɔkwan a wɔfaa so tenaa ase ne sɛnea wowui na munsua wɔn gyidi no.

8.verse: Yesu Kristo te saa ara nnera, nnɛ, ne daa nyinaa.

9.verse: Mommma nkyerɛkyerɛ foforo biara nntwe mo mmfi kwan pa so. Eye sɛ Onyankopɔn adom nti, yɛn kra benyin ahoɔden so a, emfi aduan ho mmara a yedi so so. Wɔn a wodi mmara a ɛte saa so no nnya mmoa biara.

10.verse: Asɔfo a na wɔsom wɔ Yudafo ntamadan mu no nni ho kwan sɛ wodi afɔrebɔde no bi wɔ afɔremuka no so.

11.verse: Yudafo sɔfo panyin no de mmoa no mogya ba Kronkronbea hɔ de bɛbɔ bɔne afɔre nanso wɔhyew mmoa no funu wɔ beae no akyi baabi.

12.verse: Eyi nti, Yesu nso wui wɔ kurow no pon akyi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔde ɔno ara ne mogya bɛpopa nnipa bɔne.

13.verse: Momma yɛnkɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ beae no akyi nkogye animguase no bi.

14.verse: Efisɛ, yenni atenae a ɛwɔ hɔ daa wɔ asase yi so. Yɛrehwehwɛ kurow a ɛrebɛba no akyi kwan.

15.verse: Momma yɛmfa Yesu so mfa yɛn anofafa nkamfo Onyankopɔn din daa sɛ yɛn afɔrebɔde.

16.verse: Mommma mo werɛ mmfi sɛ mobɛyɛ mo ho mo ho papa aboaboa mo ho mo ho, efisɛ, ɛno ne afɔrebɔ a ɛsɔ Onyankopɔn ani.

17.verse: Muntie mo mpanyimfo na munni wɔn asɛm so. Esiane sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wobu wɔn adwuma ho akontaa nti, wɔhwɛ mo kra so a wɔnhome koraa. Sɛ mutie wɔn a, wɔde anigye bɛyɛ wɔn adwuma. Sɛ anyɛ saa a, wɔde awerɛhow bɛyɛ adwuma no na ɛremmoa mo.

18.verse: Monkɔ so mmɔ mpae mma yɛn. Yenim pefee sɛ yɛwɔ adwene a emu da hɔ, efisɛ, yɛpɛ sɛ bere biara, yɛyɛ ade a eye.

19.verse: Na mebɔ mpae kɔ so srɛ mo sɛ, mommɔ mpae na Onyankopɔn mfa me mmrɛ mo nnansa yi ara.

20.verse: Onyankopɔn anyan yɛn Awurade Yesu a ɔyɛ oguanhwɛfo panyin no afi awufo mu ama yɛn na ɛnam ne wu no so nti, wɔasɔw daa apam no ano ama yɛn.

21.verse: Asomdwoe Nyankopɔn mma mo nea ehia mo nyinaa na monam so ayɛ n’apɛde na ɔnam Yesu Kristo so ayɛ yɛn mu adwuma sɛnea ɛsɔ ani. Anuonyam nka Kristo daa nyinaa. Amen.

22.verse: Anuanom, mesrɛ mo sɛ, monyɛ aso ntie nkuranhyɛ nsɛm yi, efisɛ, saa krataa a makyerɛw mo yi nyɛ tenten biara.

23.verse: Mepɛ sɛ mebɔ mo amanneɛ sɛ wayi yɛn nua Timoteo afi afiase. Sɛ ɔba ntɛm a, me ne no bɛba mo nkyɛn.

24.verse: Yekyia mpanyimfo no ne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo no nyinaa. Anuanom a wɔwɔ Italia no kyia mo.
